title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. KK, pt. 9950 - Access To Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 9950.1 - Statement of purpose
§ 9950.2 - Definitions

§ 9950.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained
§ 9950.5 - Fees for copying records
§ 9950.6 - Availability of panel records
§ 9950.7 - Procedures governing inspection and copying of records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. KK, pt. 9950

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §§ 87[b], 94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
